name: 蔡一豪
objective:
課程旨在介紹和深入探討電路分析的進階概念和技術。將涵蓋正弦穩態功率計算、平衡三相電路、拉普拉斯變換及其在電路分析中的應用、頻率選擇電路、主動濾波電路、傅立葉級數和傅立葉轉換、雙埠網路等主題，旨在培養學生在電路設計與分析方面的能力。
This course aims to introduce and delve into advanced concepts and techniques in circuit analysis. It will cover topics such as sinusoidal steady-state power calculation, balanced three-phase circuits, Laplace transforms and their applications in circuit analysis, frequency selective circuits, active filter circuits, Fourier series and Fourier transforms, and two-port networks. The course is designed to develop students' abilities in circuit design and analysis.
schedule:
1. Course Introduction
2. Sinusoidal Steady-State Power Calculation
3. Sinusoidal Steady-State Power Calculation
4. Sinusoidal Steady-State Power Calculation
5. Balanced Three-Phase Circuits
6. Midterm Exam I
7. Introduction to Laplace Transform
8. Introduction to Laplace Transform
9. Applications of Laplace Transform in Circuit Analysis
10. Introduction to Frequency-Selective Circuits
11. Introduction to Frequency-Selective Circuits
12. Active Filter Circuits
13. Midterm Exam II
14. Fourier Series
15. Fourier Series
16. Fourier Transform
17. Fourier Transform
18. Final Exam

※ Course schedule and content are subject to adjustment based on students’ learning progress.
scorePolicy:
Midterm Exam I: 30%
Midterm Exam II: 30%
Final Exam: 40%

※ Evaluation items and grading weights are subject to adjustment based on students’ learning progress.
materials: James W. Nilsson and Susan A. Riedel, "Electric Circuits," 11/e, Pearson, 2020. (滄海圖書代理)
